about_me.des: Hi, my name is Cheng Gu. I love 3D game programming, and have a strong passion of learning Computer Graphics!

projects.p1: A web game Inspired by Snake VS Block. The storyline is The Chicken Mother needs to fight with bad animals for saving her children. First programming project.
projects.p2: A VR Demo Aimed to reduce the problem of motion sickness, used a third person view Spiderman style swinging game demo to try to discover a new world in visual reality for reducing this adverse consequence. In this Project, I create everything by myself, such as the building blocks, character model, particles, animations, and many game mechanics such as swinging moving, battle system, and wall walking. Also, I created an infinite city generator instead of spending time on level design.
projects.p3: An installation project which used the versatility of projection mapping and the depth of infinity mirrors to show a piece that would inspire curiosity about the wonders, beauty, and unknowns that lie deep beneath the surface of what the human eye can perceive; the deep sea
projects.p4: An RPG Rhythm Game Demo that collaborated with Game Design & Art Students in the Game Prototype class. Functions Includes Inventory System, Data Saving and Loading, Dialogue, Social Media, Rhythm Gameplay, UI framework, and Storyline, Shopping, Evolving, and so on
projects.p5: A Level Design and Unity Shader Programming Project for creating a beautiful cartoon environment.
projects.p6: Modeled and Textured some props for the 3D game art fundmental class. Include 'Old Well', 'Lamp', 'Hidden Blade', and 'Roscoe'
projects.p7: An Animated Led Sign built for my Major, be able to send msg to Adafruit and change the Led Animation and the Motor movement states.
projects.p8: A Multiplayer AR Game, aimed to create an interactive game which will be like a combination of a marker based “Poké mon Go” Game and Flag Capturing style game. A competitive game that makes players choose a team and try their best to collect the markers around the campus for better score.
projects.p9: An AR basketball shooting game, shoot methods include swap screen and voice command by using Watson API.

career.college_des: At September 2016,I went to Woodbury University majoring Applied Computer Science, and started my IT career.
career.companyA: Math & Science Tutoring Center in Woodbury University
career.companyA_des: At October 2017,I got my first on-campus job, which is tutoring student in the Math and other Science Subjects at Woodbuty University Tutoring Center.
